timeline.bodyText: I still think "required" needs clarification or removal.  As an alternative, perhaps something like:  "This section lists all fields used by the current version of the SIEM app when it queries, aggregates, filters, displays, or renders event data."

timeline.bodyText:
suggest removing "whenever possible" to make this more clear and authoritative.
suggest changing "will adopt" to "is expected to adopt"
suggest removing the mention of deprecation, as we're not sure if we'll actually deprecate their use.  It is true that we hope to remove all dependencies on non-ECS fields, but that's not really the same thing.
suggest change "updating you" to "updating your"

I think there's still a message that is not getting across.  Here's what I think it should say, in rough terms:

Here's the list of fields required by the current version of the SIEM app. (This should have very few, if any, non-ECS fields)
When building your ingest pipelines, do NOT limit your implementation to only these required fields, but instead populate as many ECS fields as possible/practical, since future versions of the SIEM app are expected to adopt additional ECS fields, and if you do only the required ones, you'll have to update your ingest pipelines in the future.
